fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.statement
Class ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext

java.lang.Object
  fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.statement.U3duJexlContext
      fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.statement.ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.jexl2.JexlContext
public class ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext
extends U3duJexlContext

A service-aware implementation of JexlContext for expressions evaluation. The main aim is to be able to correctly handle properties access such as:

  • "this_myPropertyName" for a provider's property;
  • "other_theirPropertyName" for a consumer's property.

Author:
Sylvain Cambon

Constructor Detail

ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext

public ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext(WorldObject thisObject,
                                   WorldObject otherObject,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters,
                                   ExecutionMode mode)
Instantiates a new Jexl Context using two World objects. The first one is the provider and the second one the consumer.

Parameters:
thisObject - The provider.
otherObject - The consumer.
parameters - the parameters
mode - the mode

ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext

public ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext(WorldObject thisObject)
Instantiates a new Jexl Context using properties container. The consumer as well as the parameters are null. The execution mode is virtual.

Parameters:
thisObject - the object on which one wants to apply properties

Returns:

Throws:
UnknownPropertyException - If the property cannot be found.
